contest-event.event-date:
May 16, 1999 D SCABA Entertainment Contest (B Section)
SCABA Entertainment Contest (B Section) 20 Entertainments Contest with Deportment Mark SCABA Entertainment Contest scaba-entertainment-contest-b-section
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex 18th annual contest Highest Unplaced 3rd Section Band - Mid Sussex Brass Best Soloist: (shared) Julie Scrace, Vocalist, Mayfield & Kevin Webb, Trombone, Chichester City Best trombone Section: Chichester City Best Compere: John Williams, Chichester City.
May 27, 2015, 1:29 p.m. June 17, 2020, 4:55 p.m.
1 Chichester City Band John Williams
2 Haslemere Town Band Graham Wade
3 Mayfield Band Roy Fuller
4 Croydon Brass Band Matthew Hackett
5 Mid Sussex Brass Sally Fisher
6 Basingstoke Silver Band Keith Whitmore
